title: Senior Designer
content:
This will be my last post on Typophile, so I thought it should be at least a positive one.

I have been contacted by a major NYC studio that is looking for a senior graphic designer with good lettering skills.

Please do not post here, but send the link to your portfolio to me via my contact info in my profile.

See you all in the future some day.

James
author: terminaldesign

comments.content:
Sounds great!  
Good luck with everything.
Why you calling it your last post, James? Where are you going?
I'm curious too. We'll be losing a great resource.

I'm going to Antarctica to practice writing with urine is sub-freezing temperatures.

Isn't anyone interested in the senior designer's position?

<cite>Isn’t anyone interested in the senior designer’s position?</cite>

If I fake a resume will they check my references?
